articles.title: Exclusive: Argentina, IMF staff-level agreement set to combine reviews on $44 billion loan, sources say
articles.description: Argentina's preliminary deal with the International Monetary Fund is set to combine reviews of its $44 billion loan programme, according to four sources, potentially paving the way for streamlining payments to the cash-strapped country.
articles.content: LONDON, July 28 (Reuters) - Argentina's preliminary deal with the International Monetary Fund is set to combine reviews of its $44 billion loan programme, according to four sources, potentially paving the way for streamlining payments to the cash-str... [3281 chars]

articles.title: Argentina scores two goals in furious Women's World Cup comeback to earn draw against South Africa
articles.description: Argentina scored two game-saving goals in a flurry of five minutes during the second half Friday to salvage a 2-2 draw with South Africa at the Women’s World Cup.
articles.content:
Argentina scored two game-saving goals in a flurry of five minutes during the second half Friday to salvage a 2-2 draw with South Africa at the Women’s World Cup.
The draw gave both teams a single point in Group G. Sweden and Italy, the co-leaders of... [2552 chars]

articles.title: Argentina comeback denies South Africa first win at Women's World Cup
articles.description: Romina Nunez scored the equaliser as Argentina roared back from two goals down to draw 2-2 and deny South Africa a landmark first Women's World Cup win on Friday.
articles.content:
Romina Nunez scored the equaliser as Argentina roared back from two goals down to draw 2-2 and deny South Africa a landmark first Women's World Cup win on Friday.
South Africa were cruising to a first-ever win in five matches at the World Cup after g... [2425 chars]

articles.title: Saba Azad shares photos with beau Hrithik Roshan from Argentina vacation, calls him her ‘hippo heart’
articles.description: Hrithik Roshan is holidaying in Buenos Aires, Argentina, with his actor-singer girlfriend Saba Azad.
articles.content: It is vacation time for one of the hottest couples in B-town, Hrithik Roshan and Saba Azad. Saba took to her Instagram page to share two photos from Buenos Aires, Argentina, as the couple indulged in some yummy-looking desserts and also posed for a s... [612 chars]

articles.title: Sophia Braun belter helps Argentina fight back to 2-2 draw with South Africa
articles.description: Late goals from Braun and Romina Nunez salvage point for Argentina after Banyana Banyana let early lead slip away
articles.content:
Argentina and South Africa settled for an exciting 2-2 draw in their Women’s World Cup Group G clash at Dunedin Stadium on Friday that kept both teams alive in the tournament but dented their hopes of progressing.

articles.description: Argentina scores pair of late goals to salvage 2-2 tie against South Africa at Women’s World Cup

articles.title: Sophia Braun scores best goal of FIFA Women’s World Cup in Argentina’s thrilling draw with South Africa
articles.description: The stunning volley is the early favourite for the goal of the tournament.
articles.content:
Argentina have produced the comeback of the FIFA Women’s World Cup, scoring two late goals to draw 2-2 with South Africa in Dunedin.
Linda Motlhalo and Thembi Kgatlana struck either side of halftime to put South Africa 2-0 up in Friday’s Group G clas... [2446 chars]

articles.title: Fernando Perez Algaba: Missing crypto influencer found stuffed inside suitcase in Argentina
articles.description: A group of children stumbled on the suitcase in Argentina - and were shocked to find the dismembered remains of the missing millionaire stuffed inside.
articles.content:
The dismembered remains of a missing millionaire crypto influencer were found stuffed inside a suitcase by a group of children in a stream in Argentina, local media reported.
Fernando Perez Algaba’s mutilated body was found days after the 41-year-old... [3168 chars]
